code: export function validateEmail(email){var re=/^(([^<>()[\]\\.,;:\s@"]+(\.[^<>()[\]\\.,;:\s@"]+)*)|(".+"))@((\[[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\])|(([a-zA-Z\-0-9]+\.)+[a-zA-Z]{2,}))$/;return re.test(String(email).toLowerCase());}export function checkPassword(input){var passw=/^[A-Za-z]\w{7,14}$/;if(input.match(passw)){return true;}return false;}
